author: Daniel McLaughlin
title: China closes border with Russia as Covid-19 threat shifts
description: Virus lockdown lifted on Wuhan but imposed on Suifenhe on Russian frontier
content:
China has closed its land border with Russia, as the country where the coronavirus outbreak began tries to stop infected people arriving from its northern neighbour, where the number of cases is still rising sharply.
Russia reported a record one-day increase… [+2889 chars]
